name: Jump Tomato
description:
Jump Tomato Description

Jump Tomato is a simple platform game, where you should just collect points and beat the highest score on your device.

Tommy the tomato is trying to escape from the farm. The farm's soil is a little soft, and it's collapsing. In the situation of the farm, Tommy can't even walk, so he could only jump.

Tommy the tomato can't handle high fall, so avoid falling from the platforms.

Help Tommy to move between platforms by giving him the hint to the next platform.

Controls

To make Tommy jump, touch or hold the left mouse button to the direction where Tommy should jump. If you release the touch/mouse click, Tommy will jump.

Tools

Construct 3 - Game Engine

Aseprite - Image assets creation tool

Garage Band - Music assets creation tool
